name: JoyLife
0:
”Alexa, turn on tom”
”Alexa,turn off tom”
”Alexa, turn on charge on tom”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: You need to have a joy life account, and click the link to associate your account. After that, you can control your robotrobot through alexa.（You can use this function to control the robot, clean, pause, charge and other functions）
